sentences.en: Analysis the nonconformity from customer side or production feedback if the root cause is material quality.
sentences.cn: 负责分析可能因材料质量问题引起的客户端或生产中的不良.

sentences.en: Correction: action to eliminate a detected nonconformity.
sentences.cn: 纠正: 为消除已发现的不合格所采取的措施.

sentences.en: Feed back nonconformity found in incoming inspection to leader and relative department for solution.
sentences.cn: 在进货检验发现不良后及时反馈给领班,并通知相关部门解决.

sentences.en: For nonconformity the world whips you with its displeasure ( Ralph Waldo Emerson )
sentences.cn: 只因不随俗,整个世界都用不悦鞭笞着你 ( 拉尔夫沃尔多埃默森 )

sentences.en: His nonconformity was a headache for the management.
sentences.cn: 他不守规则的态度令管理层十分头痛.

sentences.en: Investigating the nonconformity from operation process, push the modification and training.
sentences.cn: 发现设备操作异常并推动改进及培训.

sentences.en: Lovelock's principled nonconformity can be traced to his childhood.
sentences.cn: 洛夫洛克自成一套的特立独行可以追溯到他的童年时期。

sentences.en: Lovelock'sprincipled nonconformity can be traced to his childhood.
sentences.cn: 洛夫洛克自成一套的特立独行可以追溯到他的童年时期。

sentences.en: Nonconformity means the non fulfillment of a specified requirement.
sentences.cn: 的不符合指nonfulfillment某一特定要求.

sentences.en: The organization shall deal with nonconforming product by taking action to eliminate the detected nonconformity.
sentences.cn: 组织应采取方法处置不合格品,如采取措施消除发现的不合格.

sentences.en: You'll have to notice the design department immediately, if you find any nonconformity.
sentences.cn: 主题:“如有不符,须立即通知设计部门 ”, 这句怎么翻译?

sentences.en: You're deliberately unconventional. Even your choice of clothes is a statement of your nonconformity.
sentences.cn: 你故意有悖传统，甚至连着装都在表明你与众不同。

words.tran_cn: 不服从的；不信奉国教的；不相容的
不墨守成规的；不顺从一般公认信念习惯的；不信奉国教的
不顺从一般公认信念习惯的人；不属于圣公会的英国基督教徒
不遵照准则；不信奉国教（nonconform的ing形式）
不一致；不信奉国教；不墨守成规

trans.tran_cn: 新教教徒（总称），不一致，不符合
